text: The @uiowa has been on the forefront of #COVID19 research, treatments, care, and the Pfizer-BioNTech #vaccine. As we prepare to begin a clinical trial for a vaccine from Novavax, learn more about our role in turning the tide of the pandemic: https://t.co/BxDN5rdOhX #UIowaResearch https://t.co/LU4Wh2teNP
